document_data.name: Fullblade
document_data.mainbody: '''Fullblades''', also known as an '''ogre's greatsword''', were a type of large exotic sword.
document_data.Description: ''Fullblades'' were enormous, two-handed swords that were longer than ''[[greatsword]]s'' by {{SI|18|in}}
document_data.Weaponology: Medium-sized creatures were only capable of wielding a ''fullblade'' two-handed and even then needed special training. Large-sized creatures were capable of wielding it with either one or both hands.   Due to their size, ''fullblades'' dealt extremely heavy damage and had a higher propensity for lethal blows.
